description: Returns a list of shifts generated by an existing rotation in the system.

parameters.name: RotationId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rotation to retrieve shift information about.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The date and time for the end of the time range to list shifts for.

nested_items.name: RotationShifts
nested_items.description: Information about shifts that meet the filter criteria.

nested_items.name: ContactIds
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the contacts who are part of the shift rotation.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time a shift rotation begins.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time a shift rotation ends.

nested_items.name: ShiftDetails
nested_items.description: Additional information about an on-call rotation shift.

nested_items.name: OverriddenContactIds
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resources Names (ARNs) of the contacts who were replaced in a shift when an override was created. If the override is deleted, these contacts are restored to the shift.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.
